text: Nigel Martin Evans (born 10 November 1957) is a British politician. He was born in Swansea, Wales. He is the Second Deputy Chairman of Ways and Means and has been the Member of Parliament for Ribble Valley since 1992. He was a Conservative until 2013. Since then he has been an Independent. He was First Deputy Chairman of Ways and Means from 2010 to 2013. ==Personal life== Evans lives in Pendleton, Lancashire.Nigel Evans cleared He is openly gay.Deputy speaker comes out as gay In 2014 at Preston Crown Court, he was acquitted of nine sex crimes, including a rape. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:Gay men Category:British LGBT politicians Category:Living people Category:Members of the British House of Commons for English constituencies Category:People acquitted of rape Category:People acquitted of sex crimes Category:Politicians from Swansea Category:Welsh LGBT people
title: Nigel Evans
